rules.title: Respectful Interactions
rules.description: All communication between players must be respectful and free of harassment or toxicity.

rules.title: Discrimination & Hate Speech
rules.description: Discrimination, hate speech, or derogatory comments are strictly prohibited.

rules.title: Advertising
rules.description: Advertising other servers or services is not allowed in any form.

rules.title: Common Sense
rules.description: Use common sense. If you think something might not be allowed, ask staff or avoid doing it.

rules.title: Powergaming
rules.description: Performing unrealistic or unfair actions to gain an advantage is not allowed.

rules.title: Metagaming
rules.description: Using OOC knowledge in character is strictly forbidden.

rules.title: FailRP
rules.description: Breaking character or performing actions that do not suit your role is not permitted.

rules.title: FearRP
rules.description: You must act with realistic fear for your character’s life when appropriate.

rules.title: New Life Rule (NLR)
rules.description: After dying, your character forgets the events leading to death and cannot return to the area immediately.

rules.title: Criminal Limits
rules.description: There are limitations to how often and how crimes can be committed. Follow all guidelines.

rules.title: Cop Baiting
rules.description: Intentionally provoking police to initiate a pursuit or interaction is not allowed.

rules.title: Group Limits
rules.description: Follow current gang or criminal group size limits during roleplay.

rules.title: Realism & Fairness
rules.description: Police must act with professionalism and fairness during all roleplay scenarios.

rules.title: Use of Force
rules.description: Use of lethal force must be justified and escalated properly.

rules.title: Prioritising RP
rules.description: EMS must prioritise quality RP over reviving players as quickly as possible.

rules.title: No Combat Medic
rules.description: EMS cannot participate in active combat scenarios.

rules.title: Bug Abuse
rules.description: Exploiting bugs or game mechanics is strictly prohibited.

rules.title: Third Party Tools
rules.description: Using cheats or unauthorized modifications will result in a ban.

rules.title: Roleplay Quality
rules.description: We expect everyone to contribute positively to the roleplay experience.
